application.summary: Graphical tree viewer for Mecurial repositories

description.p:
hgview is a tool to visually navigate the tree and history of a Mecurial repository. hgview has a wide range of features for browsing and interacting with a Mecurial repository graphically, including:
key-based navigation of the revisions history of a repository
automatic refresh of the revision graph when the repository is modified
display of the current working directory as a special node in the graph
